title: PRESS DIGEST - Bulgaria - Oct 11
text:
SOFIA, Oct 11 (Reuters) - These are some of the main stories in Bulgarian newspapers on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

-- Bulgaria´s Energy Minister Temenuzhka Petkova and her Greek counterpart Kostis Hatzidakis signed a number of contracts for the Bulgaria-Greece natural gas inter-connector pipeline, most notably for a 110 million euro ($121.17 million) loan from the European Investment Bank

-- Bulgaria and five other European Union countries are to link up with experts from other EU countries who will help them improve their road safety as part of an EU-funded scheme, the European Commission said

-- Exports from Bulgaria in the first eight months of 2019 were 3.8% higher than in the same period previous year, the statistics office data showed. The total value of all goods exported from Bulgaria from January to August 2019 was 37,901 million levs ($213.50 million) ($1 = 0.9079 euros) ($1 = 1.7752 leva)
